document.full_text: a texas civil rights group filed a lawsuit in federal court in san antonio on monday charging that the 2010 census failed to count as many as one-tenth of the hispanics living in the state.
document.title: texas group's lawsuit: census undercounted hispanics
lines_and_colors: a texas civil rights group filed a lawsuit in federal court in san antonio on monday charging that the 2010 census failed to count as many as one-tenth of the hispanics living in the state.
